channel.title: PI/DSPK VlS Gfx or animation wrong

item.title: PI/DSPK VlS Gfx or animation wrong
item.dc:creator: @Smallboy Smallboy
item.description:
@Smallboy wrote:

When i change my VLS (Vesta longsword) animation to its right ones . its just gave me another crap animation -.-
Is the vls animation use by , Animation or GFX Emotes ??? .
case 13899: //vls //c.gfx100(248); c.specAccuracy = 1.18; c.specDamage = 1.35; c.startAnimation(6502); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

Read full topic
